text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ...Ah!! Thank goodness, I finally found you...! I've been wanting to talk to you this entire time!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Listen, thank you, truly, truly thank you! That's the main thing I wanted to tell you!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Thanks to you, so many people came out for the live show... Hehe, it feels like a dream!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Falko is an Umadol, so I planned this Birthday Live with the idea of giving a present to all my fans—even on my own birthday—but...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: To have such a wonderful stage prepared for me like this... in the end, Falko was the one who got the biggest present!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But listen, now it's time for me to return the favor! Come on, Falko's SERIOUS MOOOODE is activated!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I'm going to make this the AB-SO-LUTE best Birthday Live! With all the effort the future Top Umadol Falko can give RIGHT NOW!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: You watch from the special seat, too, okay? Make absolutely sure you look at Falko's sparkle!
